name: Traverse The Depths
description:
A game I made in 6 days for #WeeklyGameJam132

Theme: Deep Dive

Made in Unity, Maya, and Adobe Photoshop

Fonts, music, and ui are not mine (links below), everything else is made by me.

Special thanks to my sister for helping me come up with ideas for nautical folk

----------

CHaracter animations: Mixamo (mostly, I made some edits)

Music by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

UI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/easy-ui-emerald-default-112796

Fonts: 1001FreeFonts.com - Coral Sea, Coral Skittles, Lalinea Sea, Lost Sea, Ocean City Park
